title: Sellers hike broccoli prices 400% to £5-a-kilo
text: Broccoli prices rocket 400% to £5-a-kilo as market stall holders take advantage of the 'veg crisis' shortage to make desperate families pay a premium for dwindling supplies Iceberg lettuce, aubergines, cabbages and courgettes are all in short supply Broccoli, usually £1 per kg, has gone on sale for £5 per kg at London market Retail giants sourcing hundreds of tons of lettuce from California and Arizona Snow storms and flooding have blighted Spanish produce and lowered supply Many retailers have also imposed rationing to limit bulk buying by customers Published: 14:24 GMT, 5 February 2017 | Updated: 14:25 GMT, 5 February 2017 7 shares
